1 #include <ros/ros.h>
2 #include <actionlib/server/simple_action_server.h>
3 #include <saya_hospitality_perception_msgs/FaceTrackingAction.h>
4 #include <std_msgs/Float64.h>
5 #include <std_msgs/Bool.h>
6 
7 static int count_;
8 class FaceTrackingActionNode
9 {
10 protected:
11 
12  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
13  // NodeHandle instance must be created before this line. Otherwise strange error may occur.
14  actionlib::SimpleActionServer<saya_hospitality_perception_msgs::FaceTrackingAction> as_;
15  std::string action_name_;
16  // create messages that are used to published feedback/result
17  saya_hospitality_perception_msgs::FaceTrackingFeedback feedback_;
18  saya_hospitality_perception_msgs::FaceTrackingResult result_;
19 
20  ros::Subscriber sub_;
21  bool goal_;
22 
23 public:
24 
25  FaceTrackingActionNode(std::string name) :
26  as_(nh_, name, false),
27  action_name_(name)
28  {
29 
30  as_.registerGoalCallback(boost::bind(&FaceTrackingActionNode::goalCB, this));
31  as_.registerPreemptCallback(boost::bind(&FaceTrackingActionNode::preemptCB, this));
32 
33  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("as_.started");
34  as_.start();
35 
36  ROS_INFO_STREAM("--------FaceTrackingAction_Server is started-------");
37  }
38 
39  ~FaceTrackingActionNode(void)
40  {
41  }
42 
43  void goalCB()
44  {
45  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Goal Started");
46  // accept the new goal
47  goal_ = as_.acceptNewGoal()->goal;
48  ROS_INFO_STREAM(goal_);
49  if(goal_)
50  {
51  ROS_INFO_STREAM("--------FaceTrackingAction_Server Goal Recieved-------");
52  sub_ = nh_.subscribe("/sayabot_hospitality_perception/face_detection/output", 1, &FaceTrackingActionNode::analysisCB, this);
53  }
54  }
55 
56  void preemptCB()
57  {
58  ROS_INFO("%s: Preempted", action_name_.c_str());
59  // set the action state to preempted
60  as_.setPreempted();
61  }
62 
63 
64 
65  void analysisCB(const std_msgs::Bool msg)
66  {
67  if (!as_.isActive())
68  return;
69 
70 
71  // ROS_INFO_STREAM("AnalyaisCB is called");
72  // ROS_INFO_STREAM("MSG");
73  ROS_INFO_STREAM(msg);
74  if (msg.data)
75  { count_ += 1;
76  ROS_INFO_STREAM(count_);
77 
78  feedback_.feedback = true;
79  }
80  else{
81  count_ -= 1;
82  feedback_.feedback = false;
83  }
84  if(count_ >3)
85  {
86  result_.result= true;
87  count_ = 0;
88  as_.setSucceeded(result_);
89 
90  }
91  if(count_ < -3){
92  result_.result = false;
93  count_ = 0;
94  as_.setSucceeded(result_);
95 
96  }
97  }
98 
99 
100 };
101 
102 
103 int main(int argc, char** argv)
104 {
105  ros::init(argc, argv, "FaceTrackingAction_Server");
106 
107  FaceTrackingActionNode FaceTrackingAction_(ros::this_node::getName());
108  ros::spin();
109 
110  return 0;
111 }
